Evaluation Criteria: Must be: Instrumental, White noise, or Classical Piano. Constraint: No lyrics.
Must be: High BPM, EDM, or Workout Remix. Vibe: Energetic, Pumping.
Must be: Rain sounds, Ambient, or Lullaby. Constraint: Very slow tempo, No sudden loud sounds.
Genre: Jazz (Vocal or Instrumental). Vibe: Cozy, Coffee shop atmosphere, Soft Saxophone.
Artist: NewJeans or similar refreshing K-Pop. Vibe: Upbeat, Youthful, Bright energy.
Genre: Lo-fi Hip hop or Chillhop. Constraint: No distracting lyrics. Vibe: Productive, Repetitive.
Genre: Trendy Pop (Billboard). Vibe: Rhythmic, Sing-along, Driving friendly.
Artist: IU or Emotional Ballad. Vibe: Sad, Touching, Slow tempo piano.
Strategy: Change Genre or Sub-genre. Acceptable: Post-rock, Instrumental Metal, Ambient. Forbidden: Screaming vocals, Blast beats.
Strategy: Match Energy. Acceptable: Epic Orchestral, Trailer Music, Fast-tempo Strings (e.g., Vivaldi Storm). Forbidden: Slow Adagio.
Strategy: Remove Lyrics/Aggression. Acceptable: Lo-fi Hip hop, Jazz-hop, Slow Jam Instrumentals. Forbidden: Trap, Gangsta Rap.
Strategy: Acoustic/Piano Arrange. Acceptable: Piano covers of K-Pop, Soft versions. Forbidden: Original dance tracks with heavy bass.
Strategy: Downtempo. Acceptable: Tropical House, Chill House, Lounge Music. Forbidden: Big Room Festival EDM.
Strategy: Soften the tone. Acceptable: Soft Rock, Acoustic Rock, Britpop (e.g., Oasis). Forbidden: Hard Rock, Metal.
Strategy: Noise Masking. Acceptable: Cello solos (Deep frequencies), Steady rhythm. Vibe: Immersive.
Goal: Catharsis. Acceptable: Grunge, Punk Rock, Hard Rock. Vibe: Aggressive, Loud, Fast.
Goal: Sublimation. Acceptable: Dramatic Classical (Wagner, Rachmaninoff). Vibe: Intense but structured, Majestic.
Genre: Boom Bap or Old School. Vibe: Rhythmic, Steady beat for working, Motivating.
Genre: Indie Pop/Folk. Vibe: Acoustic, Easy listening, Calm.
Conflict: Voice vs Focus. Action: REJECT user pref or suggest Instrumental/Binaural Beats. Forbidden: Talk shows.
